snippet: Heavily armed peacekeepers escorted some of the last remaining Muslims out of Central African Republic's volatile capital on Sunday, trucking more than 1,300 people who for months had been trapped by violent Christian militants....

headline.print_headline: 1,300 Muslims Leave C. African Republic Capital
headline.main: 1,300 Muslims Leave C. African Republic Capital

lead_paragraph: Heavily armed peacekeepers escorted some of the last remaining Muslims out of Central African Republic's volatile capital on Sunday, trucking more than 1,300 people who for months had been trapped by violent Christian militants.
